title: Moots `Rad Dirt Fest schedule of events
content:
Are you ready to get `RAD? We have 4 days of events planned around The `Rad Dirt Fest presented by Wahoo in Trinidad, Colorado. Social gatherings, pre-rides, giveaways and beautiful gravel bikes to show. Join us for a beautiful fall weekend!

We are only a couple short weeks until we are in Trinidad, Colorado for `Rad Dirt Fest presented by Wahoo. It’s going to be a great way to cap off the Colorado gravel season. We have a number of ride events, social gatherings and event giveaways happening while we are there. Below you can find our schedule and how you can be a part of this great event. We have secured 130 Main Street as a Moots Clubhouse for the days around the event and will use the location to showcase our bikes, social gatherings, and ride starting and stopping point. Have a read below and see you there!

Thursday: September 30th

Moots Clubhouse (130 Main Street) open 9-5

  • Local ride route recommendations and hydration/nutrition samples at the Moots Clubhouse
  • Beautiful gravel show bikes on display
  • MOOTS Softgoods avaiable for purchase

Friday: October 1st

Moots Clubhouse (130 Main Street) open 9-5 and Moots Expo at packet pickup 2-7pm

  •  MOOTS PRE-RIDE: Trinidad Lake Loop 23 miles and a 50/50 mix of pavement & gravel. 3:15pm meetup,  3:30pm departs from Moots Clubhouse – Tailwind hydration supplied
  • Please RSVP for the Moots Pre-Ride Here: MOOTS PRE-RIDE
  • Event Giveaway and post-ride drinks back at the Moots Clubhouse

Saturday: October 2nd

Moots Clubhouse (130 Main Street) opens at 6am prior to the start of race – rider support (water, tire pump, nutrition) supplied

  • Finish line photos and cold drinks at Moots Clubhouse
  • 5pm MOOTS Post Race Pizzas & drinks at Moots Clubhouse
  • Event Giveaway

Sunday: October 3rd

Moots Clubhouse (130 Main Street) open prior to running race start – Tailwind and HS available

  • Hang-Over ride leaves Moots Clubhouse 8am
  • Coffee and Honey Stinger available prior to ride
  • Tailwind hydration supplied
  • Event Giveaway
